channel.title: How do you set up a Run & Compiler for your version of JDK?
channel.description:
So I downloaded a server & client but they can't find the path specified. My version of JDK is 6 update 32. Here are the codes.
Client Run [code]@echo off @title OptimusScape client "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe" -Dfile.encoding=Cp1252 -classpath bin;lib/libs.jar;lib/graphics.jar; Loader pause[/code]
Client Compiler [code]@echo off "C:\Program Files (x64)\Java\jdk1.6.0_32/bin/javac" -cp lib/*; -d bin -sourcepath src src/client.java "C:\Program Files (x64)\Java\jdk1.6.0_32/bin/javac" -cp lib/*; -d bin -sourcepath src src/Loader.java @pause[/code]
Server Run [code]@echo off title Disturbed 704 echo starting... "C:/Program Files/Java/jre7/bin/java.exe" -Xmx512m -cp bin;lib/*; com.rs.Launcher true true false pause[/code]
Server Compiler [code]@echo off title Troy's Compiler echo starting... "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_03/bin/javac.exe" -d bin -cp lib/*; -sourcepath src src/com/rs/*.java src/com/rs/cache/*.java src/com/rs/cache/loaders/*.java src/com/rs/cores/*.java src/com/rs/game/*.java src/com/rs/game/item/*.java src/com/rs/game/minigames/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/combat/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/combat/impl/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/corp/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/dragons/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/dungeonnering/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/familiar/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/godwars/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/godwars/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/godwars/bandos/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/godwars/barrows/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/godwars/saradomin/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/godwars/zammorak/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/godwars/zaros/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/kalph/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/others/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/slayer/*.java src/com/rs/game/player/*.java src/com/rs/game/player/actions/*.java src/com/rs/game/player/content/*.java src/com/rs/game/player/content/dungeoneering/*.java src/com/rs/game/player/content/dungeoneering/rooms/*.java src/com/rs/game/player/controlers/*.java src/com/rs/game/player/cutscenes/*.java src/com/rs/game/player/cutscenes/actions/*.java src/com/rs/game/player/dialogues/*.java src/com/rs/game/tasks/*.java src/com/rs/*.java src/com/rs/io/*.java src/com/rs/net/*.java src/com/rs/net/decoders/*.java src/com/rs/net/decoders/handlers/*.java src/com/rs/net/encoders/*.java src/com/rs/tools/*.java src/com/rs/utils/*.java src/com/rs/utils/huffman/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/godwars/armadyl/*.java pause[/code]
How do I edit these so it runs? or do I need a new code?
Thanks for any help

item.title: How do you set up a Run & Compiler for your version of JDK?
item.dc:creator: @Dremorain Dremorain
item.description:
@Dremorain wrote:

change the path to your path.

like, @echo off "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -cp asm-all-3.3.jar;clientlibs.jar; RunClient pause

could be a compiler,

"C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" into your direct path.

the first one is looking for JDK 7.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you set up a Run & Compiler for your version of JDK?

item.title: How do you set up a Run & Compiler for your version of JDK?
item.dc:creator: @zRickyz zRickyz
item.description:
@zRickyz wrote:

So I downloaded a server & client but they canâ€™t find the path specified. My version of JDK is 6 update 32. Here are the codes.

Client Run

@echo off @title OptimusScape client "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe" -Dfile.encoding=Cp1252 -classpath bin;lib/libs.jar;lib/graphics.jar; Loader pause

Client Compiler

@echo off "C:\Program Files (x64)\Java\jdk1.6.0_32/bin/javac" -cp lib/*; -d bin -sourcepath src src/client.java "C:\Program Files (x64)\Java\jdk1.6.0_32/bin/javac" -cp lib/*; -d bin -sourcepath src src/Loader.java @pause

Server Run

@echo off title Disturbed 704 echo starting... "C:/Program Files/Java/jre7/bin/java.exe" -Xmx512m -cp bin;lib/*; com.rs.Launcher true true false pause

Server Compiler

@echo off title Troy's Compiler echo starting... "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_03/bin/javac.exe" -d bin -cp lib/*; -sourcepath src src/com/rs/*.java src/com/rs/cache/*.java src/com/rs/cache/loaders/*.java src/com/rs/cores/*.java src/com/rs/game/*.java src/com/rs/game/item/*.java src/com/rs/game/minigames/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/combat/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/combat/impl/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/corp/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/dragons/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/dungeonnering/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/familiar/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/godwars/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/godwars/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/godwars/bandos/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/godwars/barrows/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/godwars/saradomin/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/godwars/zammorak/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/godwars/zaros/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/kalph/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/others/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/slayer/*.java src/com/rs/game/player/*.java src/com/rs/game/player/actions/*.java src/com/rs/game/player/content/*.java src/com/rs/game/player/content/dungeoneering/*.java src/com/rs/game/player/content/dungeoneering/rooms/*.java src/com/rs/game/player/controlers/*.java src/com/rs/game/player/cutscenes/*.java src/com/rs/game/player/cutscenes/actions/*.java src/com/rs/game/player/dialogues/*.java src/com/rs/game/tasks/*.java src/com/rs/*.java src/com/rs/io/*.java src/com/rs/net/*.java src/com/rs/net/decoders/*.java src/com/rs/net/decoders/handlers/*.java src/com/rs/net/encoders/*.java src/com/rs/tools/*.java src/com/rs/utils/*.java src/com/rs/utils/huffman/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/godwars/armadyl/*.java pause

How do I edit these so it runs? or do I need a new code?
